column4: ok I would need some urgent help please... I entered this command: "sudo chmod 777 /. -r" Now I can't ls in "/" Can someone please help me to fix this (if possible)?
-> you're SOL.. you may have to do a fresh install
-> do you think they are different? do an ls -la /.   and compare to  ls -la /
-> you're SOL.. you may have to do a fresh install
